title: Riot support is a joke
body: I have been trying to get Details to my email about why I banned and already told them on how my email was changed without my knowledge and asked for help instead they tell me they can’t due to the fact my brother made my account so they cannot change it to the email that used to be the one linked to my account and I am sure the email linked to said account is spam due to being *****bo123@gmail.com and me not knowing what it was but after I told them this they banned my account a couple days later and not bothering to tell me why as they already know I cannot access that email and not bothering to send the details and just keep sending bots and what is worst is the fact they banned my account after I asked for help so riot support either start reading the tickets sent you for help or just start reading what I sent to you guys

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds to me like you attempted to change the email associated with your account via a support ticket, failed to provide the information necessary to prove you were the account creator and now your account is banned?

This was most likely done as a security measure to prevent further unauthorised access to the account.

Sorry I was just angry because my account was permanently suspended due to a charge back and riot already knowing I cannot access the email still sends it to the email I cannot access and I have been trying to tell the, to send the details to the emails I have provided so I may be able to resolve the issue to my account. But they keep saying the same thing instead of just sending the details on a way to resolve this issues on my account and it has been frustrating

Itâ€™s also annoying that I have no idea on How much I have to pay or how I can repay riot so that they may unsuspend my account and because of this I feel betrayed as they were informed I could not access the email linked to my account and I have also provided them emails I can access that will let me solve these issues

Also the email that I thought was spam was actually my original email to the account and the reason I know this now is because I told my brother who made the account and he told me it was masterbo123@gmail.com the email which made my account but I changed due to me forgetting the password for it it but it was changed back without my consent which led me to using a ticket then after being told I cannot change it because my brother made it as I am sure I provided them the right details I get suspended for a charge back when I have used the same card I use to purchase rp on other games but it was only riot which suspended for a charge back which is frustrating as I have no idea how I owe or when did the charge back happened as I cannot access the email to this account and riot not just reading my suggestions to use the emails I do have access too and use those to send me the details
